sidebar.layerTip: Toggle layers on/off to visualize different data sets.

map.welcomeDesc: To get started, draw a polygon on the map by selecting the area you want to analyze.
map.welcomeTip: Use the drawing tool in the upper right corner
map.loadingDesc: Please wait while the layers are being loaded.

ndvi.title: Vegetation Index (NDVI)
ndvi.description: Measures vegetation density and health using Sentinel-2 satellite data.

lst.title: Surface Temperature (LST)
lst.description: Identifies urban heat islands using MODIS and Landsat 8 data.

lights.title: Night Lights (VIIRS)
lights.description: Indicates economic activity and energy consumption using VIIRS sensor data.

population.title: Population Density
population.description: Identifies high density areas using Global Human Settlement Layer data.

priority.title: Priority Zones
priority.description: Combined analysis identifying critical zones requiring urban intervention.

ai.locationsIdentified: {{count}} optimal location(s) for green spaces have been identified.
ai.lookForMarkers: Look for the markers on the map.

impact.title: Projected Impact
impact.whoRecommendation: WHO recommends 9 m²/resident of green space.
impact.meetsStandard: This intervention meets the international standard.

actionPlan.title: Action Plan
actionPlan.stepFeasibility: Conduct technical and legal feasibility study of the land
actionPlan.stepArchitecturalDesign: Architectural and landscape design of green space
actionPlan.stepPermitApproval: Approval of municipal and environmental permits
actionPlan.stepConstructionStart: Start of construction and installation works
actionPlan.stepFurnitureInstallation: Installation of urban furniture and irrigation systems
actionPlan.stepMaintenanceProgram: Green area maintenance and care program
actionPlan.stepImpactMonitoring: Monitoring impact on temperature and air quality
actionPlan.proposalBackedBy: This proposal is backed by NASA satellite analysis and verified geospatial data.

communicationTools.title: Communication Tools
communicationTools.usageDescription: Use the executive summary to present the proposal to municipal authorities, citizen councils, or potential funders.
communicationTools.summaryTitle: EXECUTIVE SUMMARY - GREEN URBAN INTERVENTION PROPOSAL
communicationTools.proposalDescription: {{count}} strategic green space interventions are proposed based on NASA satellite analysis.
communicationTools.benefitAirQuality: Air quality improvement: 15-25% reduction in PM2.5
communicationTools.benefitGreenSpace: Increase in green space per capita
communicationTools.benefitQualityOfLife: Improvement in quality of life and public health
communicationTools.backedBy: This proposal is backed by verified geospatial data and international best practices in sustainable urban planning.

solutionsPanel.title: Recommended Solutions
solutionsPanel.tempAction1: Implement green roofs on public and private buildings
solutionsPanel.tempAction2: Paint surfaces with reflective materials (cool roofs)
solutionsPanel.tempAction3: Create natural ventilation corridors between buildings
solutionsPanel.tempAction4: Install water fountains and water mirrors in public spaces
solutionsPanel.vegAction1: Urban tree planting program with native species
solutionsPanel.vegAction3: Convert parking lots into pocket parks
solutionsPanel.vegAction4: Tax incentives for properties with gardens
solutionsPanel.vegImpact: Goal: Increase NDVI to >0.4 in 3 years
solutionsPanel.waterAction2: Permeable pavements on sidewalks and plazas
solutionsPanel.airAction1: Vegetative anti-pollution barriers on high-traffic roads
solutionsPanel.airAction2: Promotion of active mobility (bike lanes, pedestrianization)
solutionsPanel.airAction3: Low emission zones in urban center
solutionsPanel.airAction4: Continuous air quality monitoring with IoT sensors
solutionsPanel.integratedDesc: Combining multiple solutions maximizes impact. Prioritize interventions in high population density areas.
